title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.2 - General standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 703.2 - General standards

State Regulations

Facilities providing ambulatory services shall conform to
all applicable provisions of this Chapter, including, but not limited to, meeting the standards for adequate child health services, the educational and
training needs of any interns and residents and the requirements for review of
medical records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
703.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
